mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, VA., June 27, 1888
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographic print on cardboard mount of group of visitors posing on the southeast lawn in front of the Mansion. A penciled note on the reverse indicates the photograph was taken 'June 28 - 3' (3 indicates the group number which was used to order photographs at the photographer's gallery). An accompanying newspaper fragment The World - New Jersey Edition used as backing material in the frame dates July 16, 1888.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
